List Available Retrosheet Schedule Files

Source: R/schedules.R
list_schedules.Rd

Returns a tibble of available Retrosheet schedule files. Schedules contain planned game dates, times, and teams.

Usage

list_schedules(year = NULL, check_availability = TRUE)

Arguments

year

Numeric vector of years to check. If NULL (default), checks recent years (1877-2024).

check_availability

Logical. If TRUE (default), verifies that files actually exist.

Value

A tibble with columns:

  • year - The year

  • type - Always "schedule"

  • url - The URL to download

  • available - Logical (only if check_availability = TRUE)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# List recent schedules
list_schedules(year = 2020:2024)
} # }
